review: I guess I would give four stars for function (maybe even five when the new one comes out).  But Several of the channels DO NOT work with Comcast customers.  The whole reason I bought this was for easier access to the history channel and now I'm on their forum trying to find the back door to watch the history channel because Comcast/xfinity is NOT listed as a provider. So far this is an issue with A&E;, lifetime, history, CBSgo maybe a couple others?  I guess it's comcasts fault but maybe worth looking into if you are their customer. I guess we will be streaming the XFinity go app through our phones to the Apple TV?  Not really convienent.
